ActCanada Pension Plan
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the existing definition of "full-time attendance at a school or university"; (2) create a new definition of "part-time attendance at a school or university"; (3) allow part-time students to continue to receive payment of children's benefits during normal periods of scholastic vacation and during absences due to illness; (4) allow dependent children aged 18 to 24 to provide an attestation confirming their attendance at school or university, with supporting documentation; (5) require student’s attestation of attendance or parent’s information about their amount of parenting time to reinstate the disabled contributor’s child’s benefit; and (6) make other minor administrative changes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0265 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
